entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as looking over at Ron and having thoughts about Angelina's faith in him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as hunched in a corner, staring at his knees, and clutching a bottle of butterbeer. He is also mentioned to have left the pitch.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is described as showing faith in Ron's abilities and refusing to let him resign from the team.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as reading Harry's mind and stating that Angelina still won't let Ron resign.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as looking over at Ron's crumpled figure and making a joke about taking the mickey out of him.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned to be wandering over with Fred.

relationships.description: Ginny quoted Angelina saying she knows Ron has it in him.
Fred looked over at Ron's crumpled figure.
